meanings.definition: A substance used to polish or clean shoes.
meanings.sent1: I bought some blackings to make my shoes shiny.
meanings.sent2: He applied the blackings to his boots before the party.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog got into the blackings and left paw prints all over the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as freshly polished shoes with blackings.
meanings.sent5: The smell of blackings filled the room as he worked on his shoes.

meanings.definition: The act of applying such a substance to shoes.
meanings.sent1: After buying the blackings, he started the shoe cleaning process.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the ritual of blackings on her favorite pair of shoes.
meanings.sent3: The blackings application turned into a fun game for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The blackings dance of shoe cleaning brought a smile to her face.
meanings.sent5: The sound of blackings being applied was soothing to his ears.
